title: Why didn't I get the Mastery Token.
body:
Hey, guys so I have Level 5 Mastery with Zac and just did a game with some friends on the normal rift. nothing special, no special game modes and no Aram  just a regular rift and got an S rank on Zac but didn't get my last token I need for my level 6 mastery. if anyone could help that would be great.
 {{champion:154}}

replies.body:
Probably just a visual bug where it didn't pop up. Either that or you already have two tokens :)

[(You have two tokens ready to be crafted btw)](http://championmasterylookup.derpthemeus.com/summoner/?summoner=Xander126%20&region=NA)
